name: Webshots Collection File
summary: Learn about .WBC files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: NOTE: Webshots Desktop Connect was formerly known as Webshots Desktop and was owned by AG Interactive before being acquired by Threefold Photos in 2012.

description: File used by Webshots Desktop Connect, a program that allows users to share, organize, and view pictures; contains a collection of .JPEG pictures stored in a proprietary format; used for organizing multiple pictures in a single collection; often contain encrypted data.
